question: What is the theme of the 2018 International Youth Day (IYD)?
explanation: The International Youth Day (IYD) is celebrated every year on August 12 to recognize the efforts of the world\'s youth in enhancing global society.  The day is the brainchild of the United Nations to draw attention to a given set of cultural and legal issues surrounding the youth of today. The 2018  theme is \"Safe Spaces for Youth\". The UN has taken this initiative to drive attention towards youth development and protection and the areas that include education, employment, environment, HIV/AIDS, girls and young women, and intergenerational relations.
